alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Lafayette; Panola; Pontotoc; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 4:17PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lafayette, Chickasaw, northern Yalobusha, Calhoun, southwestern Pontotoc and eastern Panola Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 417 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pope to near Banner to Pheba. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oxford, Batesville, Houston, Water Valley, Holly Springs National Forest, John W Kyle State Park, Bruce, Calhoun City, Sardis, Vardaman, Como, Derma, Pope, Pittsboro, Randolph, Velma, Pyland, Springdale, Burgess and Banner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Chickasaw; Lafayette; Panola; Pontotoc; Yalobusha
